prompt: Medium-wide photorealistic shot of the interior of an elegant, glass-fronted antique curio cabinet made of dark, rich wood. Inside, multiple shelves display a diverse collection of valuable antique porcelain figurines (Dresden lace, Capodimonte, early Derby). The figurines are artfully arranged, showcasing variety in style and era. The cabinet fills most of the 16:9 frame, with glimpses of a sophisticated room (like a study or library) visible around its edges. Soft ambient room light is complemented by subtle, warm internal cabinet lighting, making the porcelain surfaces glow gently. Minimal, realistic reflections on the glass. Focus is sharp on the figurines within the cabinet. --ar 16:9

prompt: Extreme close-up macro photograph focusing on the underside base of a valuable 18th-century antique porcelain figurine. The maker's mark (e.g., Chelsea anchor or Meissen crossed swords) is sharply in focus, revealing intricate detail and slight wear indicative of age. The texture of the porcelain, perhaps with tiny imperfections or crazing, is highly detailed. The rest of the figurine rises vertically, blurring softly into a neutral, dark velvet background. Dramatic, focused spotlighting from above highlights the mark and texture, creating subtle shadows. High-definition, photorealistic style emphasizing details crucial for valuation. --ar 16:9
name: antique-porcelain-figurines-value-image-3.png

prompt: Photorealistic wide shot capturing a prestigious auction house preview setting. In the foreground, positioned on the right third of the 16:9 frame, a single, exceptionally rare antique porcelain figurine (e.g., KPM Berlin mythological figure) rests on a plush velvet pedestal under focused museum-quality spotlighting. The background is softly blurred but suggests an elegant room with other art objects on display and a few indistinct figures of potential bidders milling about. The lighting creates a dramatic contrast, making the figurine the undeniable focal point, conveying exclusivity and high value. Cinematic, high-end professional photography style. --ar 16:9
name: antique-porcelain-figurines-value-image-4.png

prompt: Evocative still life composition in photorealistic style. On the left side of the 16:9 frame, a delicate antique porcelain figurine (e.g., a Bow shepherdess) sits on a weathered antique oak table. Next to it, on the right, leans a faded sepia-toned photograph or an old framed engraving depicting a similar figurine within an 18th-century interior setting. A leather-bound book might rest nearby. Natural light streams in from a window to the left, illuminating the figurine brightly and casting soft shadows across the table. The focus is sharpest on the figurine, gently softening towards the historical image, creating a connection between past and present value. Warm, slightly nostalgic atmosphere. --ar 16:9
